response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and efficiency. Given its high value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $11,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of partnering with you.", "product_price": 11500}
